author: Jack Montgomery, Jack Montgomery
title: Coronavirus: Sadiq Khan Insisted Crowded Tube Posed 'No Risk' on March 3rd
description: Mayor Sadiq Khan is pleading with people to stay off the London Underground, or Tube, to keep it safe for key workers -- but as recently as March 3rd he said travel on the subway system presented "no risk".
content:
Mayor Sadiq Khan is pleading with people to stay off the London Underground, or Tube, to keep it safe for key workers — but as recently as March 3rd he said travel on the subway system presented “no risk”.
In an televised interview on Good Morning Britain, M… [+4355 chars]
